titlestmt.titleproper: Overview of the Douglas Smith miscellaneous papers
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2017-11-30T13:59-0800
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

change.item: Added links to materials on digitalcollections.hoover.org

did.abstract: Memoir, leaflets, and computer disk relating to the attempted coup in the Soviet Union in 1991. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: Collection is open for research. Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items, computer media, and digital files. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos, films, or digital files during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Douglas Smith miscellaneous papers, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 2010.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the online catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

altformavail.head: Alternate Forms Available
altformavail.p: Digital copies of select records also available at https://digitalcollections.hoover.org.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Memoir, leaflets, and computer disc relating to the attempted coup in the Soviet Union in 1991.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents note
scopecontent.p: Color photographs taken by Smith in Moscow during August 1991 coup. No captions or descriptions are available, though the memoir in the collection may provide some context and description of the photos. The images are 400 ppi, 24-bit RGB JPG files. One compact disc located in Box 1.

dao.title: Photographs taken in Moscow streets during the August 1991 coup

daodesc.p: Photographs taken in Moscow streets during the August 1991 coup, 1991 August

did.unittitle: Rest of collection not yet described
